title: PreSeason Ranked
body:
I hope there will be something put into place over these people that dont connect in game at start feel like they waste peoples time. Like you have a good match up and a good counter for it. Yet your 5th person or the odd one out is afk. 

But that's not the main issue what I get nowadays is people insta locking in draft ranked games and insta locking a lane without permission and dont commit to there role.  It's a bit frustrating ,  that some of the people on OCE don't know how to play more than one role and insist others they can play that role better and end up inting or feeding in the end.
